content: मूढ {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [मुह-क्त] {@--1@} Stupefied, infatuated; <ls>Pt. 2. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Perplexed, bewildered; confounded, at a loss; किंकर्तव्यतामूढः ‘being at a loss what to do’; so ह्रीमूढ <ls>Me. 68.</ls> {@--3@} Foolish, silly, dull, stupid, ignorant; अल्पस्य हेतेर्बहु हातुमिच्छन्विचारमूढः प्रतिभासि मे त्वं <ls>R. 2. 47.</ls> {@--4@} Mistaken, erring, deceived, gone astray. {@--5@} Abortive. {@--6@} Confounding. --ढः A fool, blockhead, dolt, an ignorant person; मूढः परपत्ययनेयबुद्धिः <ls>M. 1. 2.</ls> --ढाः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab>) An epithet of the elements in the Sāṃkhya philosophy.
